hero.title: Your voice, every language, same emotion
hero.description:
AI-powered video translation that keeps your original tone and feeling
So you sound like you, in any language

introduce.title: What is ReVoice?
introduce.label: Product Introduction
introduce.description: ReVoice is an AI-powered video translation tool that preserves your original voice tone and emotion, helping your voice cross language barriers.

items.title: Human-like Translation
items.description: AI deep learning technology delivers natural, fluent voice translation that rivals professional dubbing.

items.title: Voice Cloning Technology
items.description: Precisely clones your voice characteristics, maintaining your unique tone and speaking style.

items.title: Multilingual Cloning
items.description: Supports bidirectional translation and cloning between Chinese and English, reaching global audiences.

items.title: Background Audio Preservation
items.description: Intelligently separates voice from background audio, perfectly preserving original video music and sound effects after translation.

benefits.title: ReVoice Use Cases
benefits.label: Multi-scenario Applications
benefits.description: From content creation to educational outreach, ReVoice helps industries break language barriers and reach global audiences.

items.title: Content Creators Going Global
items.description: Translate Chinese videos into English, Japanese, and more with one click, preserving your unique voice to easily expand into overseas markets and grow your influence.

items.title: Educational Content Localization
items.description: Translate quality English educational videos like BBC into Chinese, preserving original emotion so children can learn in their native language.

items.title: Cross-language Online Teaching
items.description: Educators can translate courses into multiple languages, allowing students to not only read subtitles but hear natural, fluent pronunciation in their native language.

usage.title: Four Steps to Video Translation
usage.description: Simple four-step process to help your videos cross language barriers:

items.title: Upload Video
items.description: Supports multiple video formats, drag and drop or click to upload your original video file.

items.title: Select Languages
items.description: Choose source and target languages, supporting translation between Chinese, English, Japanese, Korean, and more.

items.title: Start Conversion
items.description: AI intelligent processing with real-time progress bar, typically completed in just a few minutes.

items.title: Preview and Download
items.description: Preview translation results online, download high-quality video file with one click when satisfied.

features.title: Why Choose ReVoice
features.description: Leading AI technology providing the most natural cross-language video experience.

items.title: Voice Cloning Technology
items.description: Precisely replicates your tone, intonation, and speaking habits, so the translated voice still sounds like you.

items.title: Perfect Background Audio Preservation
items.description: Intelligently separates voice from background audio, preserving original video music and sound effects after translation.

items.title: Multi-language Support
items.description: Supports mainstream languages including Chinese, English, Japanese, and Korean, with more languages coming soon.

items.title: Emotion Preservation
items.description: AI deep learning captures original voice emotion, maintaining the same emotional expression after translation.

items.title: Fast Processing
items.description: Efficient AI algorithms typically complete video translation processing in just a few minutes.

items.title: More Possibilities Ahead
items.description: Coming soon: free replacement of tone, language, emotion, and content - four key elements. Stay tuned!

stats.title: Users Trust ReVoice
stats.description: Because we make voices cross languages with emotions intact.

testimonials.title: What Users Say About ReVoice
testimonials.description: Hear from creators and educators on how ReVoice helps them break language barriers and reach global audiences.

items.name: Li Wei
items.quote: ReVoice changed everything for me. I can now share my Chinese cooking videos with English-speaking audiences while keeping my authentic voice. My international followers grew 300% in just 2 months!

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.quote: As a parent, I wanted my kids to watch quality English educational content in Chinese. ReVoice preserves the original emotion and tone perfectly - it's like the narrator is speaking Chinese naturally!

items.name: Takeshi Yamamoto
items.quote: I teach programming in Japanese, but wanted to reach global students. ReVoice lets me create English, Chinese, and Korean versions in minutes. My student base expanded 5x!

items.name: Maria Garcia
items.quote: The voice cloning is incredible - it really sounds like me speaking different languages! My Spanish travel vlogs now reach audiences in China, Japan, and Korea. Game changer!

items.name: Chen Ming
items.quote: I review gadgets in Chinese, and ReVoice helps me reach English-speaking tech enthusiasts. The background music preservation is perfect - my production quality stays intact!

items.name: Emma Thompson
items.quote: ReVoice is a breakthrough for language education. I can show students how the same content sounds in different languages while maintaining emotional context. Absolutely brilliant!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About ReVoice
faq.description: Have more questions? Feel free to contact our customer support team.
faq.tip: Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our customer support team

items.question: What is ReVoice and what can it do for me?
items.answer: ReVoice is an AI-powered video translation tool that translates your videos into multiple languages while preserving your original voice tone and emotional expression, so you sound like yourself in any language.

items.question: Can the translated voice really preserve my tone?
items.answer: Yes! We use advanced AI voice cloning technology that precisely replicates your tone, intonation, and speaking habits, making the translated voice sound authentically like you.

items.question: Which languages are supported for translation?
items.answer: Currently supports translation between mainstream languages including Chinese, English, Japanese, and Korean. We're continuously expanding our language support range.

items.question: How long does video translation take?
items.answer: Processing time depends on video length. Typically, a 5-10 minute video takes just a few minutes to complete. We provide real-time progress updates so you can track the processing status.

items.question: Will background music be preserved?
items.answer: Yes! Our AI technology intelligently separates voice from background audio, perfectly preserving the original video's background music and sound effects after translation for a natural, seamless result.

items.question: What new features are coming?
items.answer: We're developing the ability to freely replace four key elements: tone, language, emotion, and content, giving you more flexibility in customizing your video content. Stay tuned!
